name: 洪媽益
objective: 本課程旨在提昇學生撰寫結構完整段落和短文之能力, 並著重如何重寫、摘要、 轉述、 陳述、筆記、編排、起草、修改等相關技巧。
schedule:
Week 1 Course introduction
Week 2 Topic sentence
Week 3 Supporting sentences/Review of Articles
Week 4 Supporting sentences/Information structure
Week 5 Concluding sentences
Week 6 Descriptive paragraphs
Week 7 Narrative paragraphs
Week 8 Word Logic
Week 9 Expository paragraphs
Week 10 Pargraph unity
Week 11 Reading-writing connection
Week 12 Coherence
Week 13 Cohesion
Week 14 Connectors
Week 15 Process
Week 16 Reasons and Results
Week 17 Opinion
Week 18 Final exam
scorePolicy:
weekly homework 40%
quizzes and exercises 30%
final exam 30%
materials:
Boardman, Cynthia. 2008. Writing to communicate: paragraphs. New York: Longman.

available at Tunghua Bookstore 02-2311-4027
